results.title: Tom Lee Predicts Ethereum Rally to $5,500 Soon, $12,000 by Year-End – Is This Realistic?
results.description: Fundstrat CIO Tom Lee has projected Ethereum’s near-term rise to $5,500 and a year-end target of $12,000. He cites Wall Street’s shift in sentiment after stablecoin legislation, $7. 65B ETH treasury holdings, and strong capital inflows, noting Ethereum’s expanding role in traditional finance and crypto markets.

results.description: Tokenization platform Securitize has predicted that Ethereum will be the future hub for real-world asset (RWA) markets, pointing to the blockchain’s dominance in institutional adoption and its potential to capture a multi-trillion-dollar opportunity. results.description: Spot Ethereum ETFs reported $455 million worth of net inflows on Tuesday, outpacing bitcoin ETFs' $88 million.

results.title: Ethereum Is Digital Fuel Powering the Next Financial Era, Says Crypto Treasury CEO
results.description: Ethereum has outperformed major tokens, with its role as infrastructure gaining traction among institutions as frameworks have advanced via the GENIUS Act. CEO Daniel Liu of Republic Technologies has described Ethereum as digital fuel and has pursued validator and derivatives yield.

results.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy Adds 3,081 BTC in $356.9M Purchase
results.description: Michael Saylor’s Strategy announced on Monday its expansion of its Bitcoin reserves, confirming the acquisition of 3,081 BTC between August 18 and August 24.
